item.title: Communicating Needs: Digital Literacy
item.author: Logan Senko, Rachel Yuen
item.description: 1 Solution Synthesis Diagram System Map A system map which communicates the complexity of the issue in a provoking and thoughtful information display: Conducted a literature review of current research Interviewed Subject-Matter Experts to contextualize the challenges and explore possible gaps in knowledge Synthesized diagrams from research findings which informed a systems map Produced an exhibit to encourage participation and foster emotional engagement with the topic Visualizations created using kumu.io 2 Challenge The United Nations' Sustainable Development Goals helped to contextualize the social complexity and interdependencies this challenge presented, the epitome of a so-called wicked problem.
